p:
Free fatty acids (FFA) and acid value (AV) were measured following the AOCS standard [ 25]. The modified ferrous oxidation-xylenol orange (FOX) method was used to determine peroxide value (PV) [ 26]. œÅ-Anisidine value (AnV) was determined according to [ 25]. Total oxidation (TOTOX) value was calculated from the PV and AnV using Equation (2).
(2)
T O T O X = 2 P V + A n V
